name: Hack
display_help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Slice
display_help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduce their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Parry
display_help: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Whirling_Sword
display_help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Disembowel
display_help: You perform a powerful Disemboweling maneuver that deals a great amount of damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Head_Splitter
display_help: You perform a devastating Head Splitter attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Broadsword attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Sword_Draw
display_help: Grant

name: Nimble_Slash
display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Power_Slice
display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Ablating_Strike
display_help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Typhoons_Edge
display_help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a striking attack. This attack is the finishing move in both the Weaken and Sweep combination attacks. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Blinding_Feint
display_help: You perform a feint attack that deals light damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to your chance to hit and damage for a brief time. This power is the finishing move in the Empower combination attack. Damage: Light, Recharge: Slow

name: Vengeful_Slice
display_help: Unleashes a series of strong attacks on your foe, dealing high lethal damage and knocking them down. This power is needed for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Sweeping_Strike
display_help: You make a sweeping strike with your blades, hitting all foes in a cone in front of you and dealing superior lethal damage to each. This power is the finishing move for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Superior Recharge: Moderate

name: One_Thousand_Cuts
display_help: Unleashes a flurry of attacks on all foes in a cone in front of you, dealing moderate lethal damage to each foe hit. This power is the opening move for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Sword_Draw
display_help: Grant

name: Sting_of_the_Wasp
display_help: You perform a standard attack with your katana. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Gamblers_Cut
display_help: You perform a quick slash with your katana. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Flashing_Steel
display_help: You swing your katana in a wide arc in front of you, slicing multiple foes. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Divine_Avalanche
display_help: You can use your katana to parry incoming melee attacks and then quickly return the favor. Divine Avalanche does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: The_Lotus_Drops
display_help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Soaring_Dragon
display_help: You perform a powerful Soaring Dragon maneuver that deals a great amount of damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Golden_Dragonfly
display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Katana attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Sword_Draw
display_help: Grant

name: Resistance
display_help: Hercules Titans are resistant to all damage. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers.
display_short_help: Self Auto, Res(All), Res Sleep, Fear

name: Strength_in_Numbers
display_help: Each Goliath contains tactical cloud sharing which greatly increases the combat effectiveness of nearby units.

name: TransLocation_Beam
display_help: Police Drones are most effective. Any unwanted riff raff that wanders into the protected zones will be quickly whisked away.

display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

name: Taser
display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has Disoriented you with his Taser.

name: Adv_Assault_Rifle
display_help: Your Defense has been lowered by the Malta Tactical Ops Advanced Assault Rifle.

name: Frag_Grenade
display_help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

name: Web_Grenade
display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has snared you in his Web Grenade. You are Immobilized, cannot fly, and your attack speed is reduced.

name: Stun_Grenades
display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has Disoriented you with his Stun Grenade.

name: Minelayer
display_help: Drops Proximity Minelayers.

name: Tactical_Retreat
display_help: Director 11 can make a tactical retreat.

name: Resistance
display_help: The Explosive Trap is fragile, but cannot be affected by secondary effects like Sleep, Disorient, or Fear.

name: Super_Speed
display_help: You can run at super-human speeds! While running at such speeds, you are a blur, and many foes will not even notice you as you speed past them. If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be slowed to normal speed. You must be at least level 14 and have Flurry or Hasten before selecting Super Speed.

name: True_Love
display_help: If Bobcat is weaker than Neuron, Neuron activates more clones in response.

name: Activate_Clones
display_help: Neuron can activate many of his clones to fight alongside him.

name: True_Love_Death
display_help: When Neuron is defeated, Bobcat becomes fully enraged.

name: True_Love_Revenge
display_help: If Bobcat is weaker than Neuron, Neuron activates more clones in response.

name: Super_Speed
display_help: You can run at super-human speeds! While running at such speeds, you are a blur, and many foes will not even notice you as you speed past them. If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be slowed to normal speed. You must be at least level 14 and have Flurry or Hasten before selecting Super Speed.

name: ADHD
display_help: Neuron's Clones suffer from a severe attention-deficit problem and can sometimes zip off without any real reason.

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: Neuron has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Bolt.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: Neuron has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Lightning Bolt.

name: Charged_Brawl
display_help: Neuron has electrocuted you and temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Brawl.

name: Lightning_Field
display_help: The Lightning Field is causing minor damage over time to you and draining your endurance.

name: Proximity_Mine
display_help: All foes that pass near this Explosive Trap will get blown to smithereens.

name: Self_Destruct_Timer
display_help: Self Destruct

name: Self_Destruct
display_help: Self Destruct

name: Resistance
display_help: The Explosive Trap is fragile, but cannot be affected by secondary effects like Sleep, Disorient, or Fear.

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Power_Burst
display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

name: Power_Thrust
display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Whirling_Hands
display_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Total_Focus
display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
